dcterms:description: A commonly-used dataset for the VQA task containing human annotated question-answer pairs for COCO images, split into train, validation, and test subsets.
dcterms:title: VQA-v2

Liwei Wang

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 31,000 images collected from Flickr with five captions each, used for image-text matching.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K

dcterms:creator: Sahar Kazemzadeh
Vicente Ordonez
Mark Matten
Tamara Berg
dcterms:description: A dataset to evaluate visual grounding performance, containing queries referring to objects in photographs of natural scenes.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO

dcterms:creator: Sahar Kazemzadeh
Vicente Ordonez
Mark Matten
Tamara Berg
dcterms:description: An extension of RefCOCO, this dataset also evaluates visual grounding performance with additional queries.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO+

dcterms:creator: Junhua Mao
Jonathan Huang
Alexander Toshev

dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating visual grounding performance, focusing on generating and comprehending unambiguous object descriptions.
dcterms:title: RefCOCOg
